title: Sparse functions (non-methods) missing from master
body_html:
Based on the cwrap, I'd expect to see functions like torch.sparse.spmm, torch.sparse.hspmm, etc. However:

>>> dir(torch.sparse)
['ByteTensor', 'CharTensor', 'DoubleTensor', 'FloatTensor', 'IntTensor', 'LongTensor', 'ShortTensor', '_C', '_SparseBase', '_TensorBase', '__builtins__', '__doc__', '__file__', '__name__', '__package__', '__path__', '_sparse_tensor_classes', 'torch']

These methods are not covered by the test suite.

body:
Based on the cwrap, I'd expect to see functions like torch.sparse.spmm, torch.sparse.hspmm, etc. However:

```
>>> dir(torch.sparse)
['ByteTensor', 'CharTensor', 'DoubleTensor', 'FloatTensor', 'IntTensor', 'LongTensor', 'ShortTensor', '_C', '_SparseBase', '_TensorBase', '__builtins__', '__doc__', '__file__', '__name__', '__package__', '__path__', '_sparse_tensor_classes', 'torch']
```

These methods are not covered by the test suite.
